vocabinfos.relatedNos: [{'strongNumber': 'H1024', 'matchingForm': 'בֵּית מַרְכָּבוֹת', 'stepTransliteration': 'bet mar.ka.vot', 'gloss': 'Beth-marcaboth', '_searchResultRange': 'Josh.19.5-1Chr.4.31@Josh.15.31-1Chr.4.31', '_zh_tw_Gloss': '伯瑪加博', '_es_Gloss': 'marchâboth', '_zh_Gloss': '伯玛加博'}, {'strongNumber': 'H4089H', 'matchingForm': 'מַדְמַנָּה', 'stepTransliteration': 'mad.man.nah', 'gloss': 'Madmannah', '_searchResultRange': '1Chr.2.49', '_zh_tw_Gloss': '麥瑪拿', '_es_Gloss': 'Madmannah', '_zh_Gloss': '麦玛拿'}]
vocabinfos.mediumDef:
Also named: bet ham.mar.ka.vot (בֵּית מַרְכָּבוֹת "Beth-marcaboth" H1024)
§ Madmannah = "dunghill"
n pr m
This name is used for:
1) a descendant of Caleb
n pr loc
2) one of the towns in the south district of Judah
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
麥瑪拿 这个字在原文的意思是 "堆肥"
陽性專有名詞
1) 一個迦勒的後裔( 代上 2:49)
專有名詞 地名
2) 猶大南區的一座城( 書 15:31)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
麦玛拿 这个字在原文的意思是 "堆肥"
阳性专有名词
1) 一个迦勒的后裔( 代上 2:49)
专有名词 地名
2) 犹大南区的一座城( 书 15:31)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.2.49;
son of: Shaaph (H8174H)
§ Madmannah = "dunghill"
n pr m
1) a descendant of Caleb
n pr loc
2) one of the towns in the south district of Judah
